text:
*<1층 택배 이용소 관련>*

1층 택배 보관장소(?)가 마련되어 있는데, 아마도 택배업체에서 만들어 놓고 간 것 같습니다.
분실의 위험이 다소 있어 보이니 고가의 제품은 집으로 배송 시켜주시 바랍니다 :blob-grin:
메리크리스마스

elements.text: <1층 택배 이용소 관련>

1층 택배 보관장소(?)가 마련되어 있는데, 아마도 택배업체에서 만들어 놓고 간 것 같습니다.
분실의 위험이 다소 있어 보이니 고가의 제품은 집으로 배송 시켜주시 바랍니다
메리크리스마스

text:
<Google Summter Internship>

The internship projects will be aligned with research topics my team is actively working on, including:
- *<https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1nYfRvg976E|Alexa Conversations>:* Alexa Conversations is a relatively new dialogue system that helps <https://developer.amazon.com/en-US/alexa/alexa-skills-kit|Alexa skill> developers <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M9C0P4-UaNQ|build skills> with reduced effort while allowing resultant dialogues to flow naturally. My team is working on several <https://www.amazon.science/blog/science-innovations-power-alexa-conversations-dialogue-management|core components>, such as a dialogue simulator, automated metrics for dialogue quality, and natural language understanding (NLU) models.
- *<https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zSE1Ya_xOoY&t=14m12s|Natural Turn Taking>:* Natural Turn Taking is a special mode of Alexa in which users can talk with Alexa more naturally <https://voicebot.ai/2020/09/25/amazon-alexa-natural-turn-taking-and-preference-learning-could-transform-alexa-into-a-super-assistant-but-not-yet/|through barging in, no use of wake words, context switching, and more>. My team has projects to process user interruptions (e.g., barging in) and support multi-party dialogues.
- *Reasoning:* My team is endeavoring to equip Alexa with reasoning abilities to handle user requests accurately and efficiently. We have several projects to enable Alexa to learn and employ <https://www.amazon.science/blog/how-amazon-is-using-self-service-to-democratize-ai|users' preferences>, understand complex requests, and make inferences based on commonsense.

The internship will be taking place in Sunnyvale, California, or remotely (TBD). A successful internship would have a direct impact on millions of Alexa users and thousands of skill developers.
*If you're interested, please send me (<mailto:yohan.jo@gmail.com|yohan.jo@gmail.com>) your CV/resume detailing your research experiences, interests, and publications if any.*
*Also please don't hesitate to email me if you have any questions.*

attachments.fallback: Amazon (Alexa): Create Alexa Skills Kit | Amazon Alexa Voice Development
attachments.title: Create Alexa Skills Kit | Amazon Alexa Voice Development
attachments.text: Amazon Alexa Skills Kit (ASK) provides self-service APIs and built-in voice interaction models that allow developers to deliver their voice experience in more than 20 different categories, including games, education, music & audio, health & fitness, smart home device, business & finance, weather, travel, and more. The Alexa Skills Kit allows developers to build voice skills for millions of devices around the world.

attachments.fallback: YouTube Video: The science behind Alexa Conversations | Amazon Science
attachments.title: The science behind Alexa Conversations | Amazon Science

attachments.fallback: Amazon Science: Science innovations power Alexa Conversations dialogue management
attachments.title: Science innovations power Alexa Conversations dialogue management
attachments.text: Dialogue simulator and conversations-first modeling architecture provide ability for customers to interact with Alexa in a natural and conversational manner.

attachments.fallback: YouTube Video: Introducing Amazon’s latest Devices & Services - 2020
attachments.title: Introducing Amazon’s latest Devices & Services - 2020
